title: FFA SIEGE BATTLE - Medieval 2 Total War Gameplay
description:
6 armies are present on the battlefield, but only one will be crowned champion!  Welcome to the very first Free for All Siege battle :D

Who do you think is going to win? http://strawpoll.me/7084088

Thanks to Paladinbob for making this :D

you can download it here: http://www.mediafire.com/download/its9ih817zkab13/6nationsv2.rar

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
